All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminMenu
 
AdminService
Service class that provides administrative operations such as logging in and unregistering users from the library system.
Book
Represents a book in the library system.
BookFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for books.
BookService
Service class responsible for handling all operations related to books: searching, borrowing, fines, overdue detection, reminders, and observer notifications.
BookTest
 
CD
Represents a CD item in the library system.
CDFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for CDs.
CDService
Service class responsible for managing CD operations in the library system.
ClientMenu
 
EmailMessage
Represents an email message used by the library's notification system.
EmailNotifier
Observer implementation that sends an email whenever it is notified.
EmailNotifierTest
Unit test for EmailNotifier.
EmailService
A mock email service used for testing the library system.
EmailService1
A real HTML email service that sends messages using Gmail SMTP.
FileDatabase
Utility class responsible for loading, saving, and managing the JSON file used as the library's database.
FineStrategy
 
Input
 
JournalFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for journals.
LibrarianMenu
 
Main
 
Observer
Observer interface used in the Observer Pattern.
OverdueReport
Represents a report of overdue items for a specific user.
SessionService
A simple session manager used to track whether a user is currently logged in or logged out.
User
Represents a user in the library system.
UserService
Service responsible for retrieving all users stored in the JSON database.
